Developer Skills

Blockchain

Knowledge of the development of decentralized blockchains as well as Ethereum's Solidity programing language and the concept and development of smart contracts.

Database

Create more dynamic and scalable applications with the incorporation of either a NoSql database like mongoDB or a structured query language such as PostgreSQL

JavaScript

Ability to create impressive asynchronous RESTful fullstack JavaScript applications along with frontend and backend frameworks such as React.JS and Express.JS

Ruby on Rails

Create fast and well established fullstack projects and complex applications with the combinaiton of Ruby along with the Rails framework
